More Service Cloud Features

Salesforce Knowledge is available in Essentials and Unlimited Editions with Service Cloud.
Available in: Salesforce Classic (not available in all orgs) and Lightning Experience
Lightning Knowledge has changed the way Knowledge works in Salesforce.

FEATURE	CLASSIC KNOWLEDGE	LIGHTNING KNOWLEDGE
Access and permissions	CRUD, profile permissions, page layouts, custom article actions per public group	CRUD, profile permissions, page layouts
Files	Attached in custom file fields	Stored in standard Files object and attached in related list
Object home	Knowledge One and Article Management tab	Knowledge home page with list views
Page layouts	Fields only, per article type and user profile	Fields, actions, related lists, per record type and user profile
Record home (articles)	Custom record home	Default Record Home, configurable via Lightning App Builder
Setup	Salesforce Classic Setup	Lightning Knowledge Setup
Sharing	Sharing by data category	Standard Salesforce sharing also available
Types of articles	Article Types	Standard Record Types
Use Knowledge in the console	Add Knowledge One to Service Console	Add Lightning Knowledge component via Lightning App Builder
title: Comparing Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience Knowledge
